mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criss, A. S. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Criss, A. S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 22 1862. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 22 1862. I have about one third 1/3 of the military in my district enlisted and can in a short time furnish my rolls if I am permitted to take the list from the rolls of the commandments of companies shall I do so what is the pay of those whom I may appoint to assist me report fully AS Criss Commissioner 57D176pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Criss, A. S.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
